mapper.insert:
SELECT GEN_RANDOM_UUID();
INSERT INTO WFNEWS.PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL ( PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL_GUID, INCIDENT_GUID, INCIDENT_NUMBER_LABEL, NEWS_CREATED_TIMESTAMP, STAGE_OF_CONTROL_CODE, GENERAL_INCIDENT_CAUSE_CAT_ID, NEWS_PUBLICATION_STATUS_CODE, DISCOVERY_DATE, DECLARED_OUT_DATE, FIRE_CENTRE_CODE, FIRE_CENTRE_NAME, FIRE_YEAR, FIRE_ZONE_ORG_UNIT_IDENTIFIER, FIRE_OF_NOTE_IND, INCIDENT_NAME, INCIDENT_LOCATION, INCIDENT_OVERVIEW, TRADITIONAL_TERRITORY_DETAIL, INCIDENT_SIZE_TYPE, INCIDENT_SIZE_ESTIMATED_HA, INCIDENT_SIZE_MAPPED_HA, INCIDENT_SIZE_DETAIL, INCIDENT_CAUSE_DETAIL, CONTACT_ORG_UNIT_IDENTIFIER, CONTACT_PHONE_NUMBER, CONTACT_EMAIL_ADDRESS, RESOURCE_DETAIL, WILDFIRE_CREW_RESOURCES_IND, WILDFIRE_CREW_RESOURCES_DETAIL, WILDFIRE_AVIATION_RESOURCE_IND, WILDFIRE_AVIATION_RSRC_DETAIL, HEAVY_EQUIPMENT_RESOURCES_IND, HEAVY_EQUIPMENT_RESOURCES_DTL, INCIDENT_MGMNT_CREW_RSRC_IND, INCIDENT_MGMNT_CREW_RSRC_DTL, STRUCTURE_PROTECTION_RSRC_IND, STRUCTURE_PROTECTION_RSRC_DTL, RESPONSE_TYPE_CODE, RESPONSE_TYPE_DETAIL, PUBLISHED_TIMESTAMP, PUBLISHED_USER_TYPE_CODE, PUBLISHED_USER_GUID, PUBLISHED_USER_USERID, PUBLISHED_USER_NAME, LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, REVISION_COUNT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES (#{publishedIncidentDetailGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=BINARY, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=BINARY, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentNumberLabel, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.newsCreatedTimestamp, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, #{dto.stageOfControlCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.generalIncidentCauseCatId, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.newsPublicationStatusCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.discoveryDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, #{dto.declaredOutDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, #{dto.fireCentreCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.fireCentreName, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.fireYear, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.fireZoneUnitIdentifier, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.fireOfNoteInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.wasFireOfNoteInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentName, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentLocation, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentOverview, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.traditionalTerritoryDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentSizeType, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentSizeEstimatedHa, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentSizeMappedHa, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentSizeDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentCauseDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.contactOrgUnitIdentifer, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.contactPhoneNumber, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.contactEmailAddress, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.resourceDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.wildfireCrewResourcesInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.wildfireCrewResourcesDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.wildfireAviationResourceInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.wildfireAviationResourceDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.heavyEquipmentResourcesInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.heavyEquipmentResourcesDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentMgmtCrewRsrcInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentMgmtCrewRsrcDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.structureProtectionRsrcInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.structureProtectionRsrcDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.responseTypeCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.responseTypeDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.publishedTimestamp, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, #{dto.publishedUserTypeCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.publishedUserGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.publishedUserUserId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.publishedUserName, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.lastUpdatedTimestamp, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, #{dto.latitude, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.longitude, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.revisionCount, javaType=java.lang.Long, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.createUser, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.createDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, #{dto.updateUser, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.updateDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN})

javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, REVISION_COUNT = REVISION_COUNT + 1, CREATE_USER = #{dto.createUser, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, CREATE_DATE = #{dto.createDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, UPDATE_USER = #{dto.updateUser, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, UPDATE_DATE = #{dto.updateDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN} WHERE PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL_GUID = #{publishedIncidentDetailGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=BINARY, mode=IN}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WFNEWS.PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL WHERE PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL_GUID = #{publishedIncidentDetailGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=BINARY, mode=IN}
mapper.select: SELECT jsonb_build_object('type', 'FeatureCollection', 'features', jsonb_agg(features.feature)) AS fc FROM (SELECT JSONB_BUILD_OBJECT( 'type', 'Feature', 'geometry', ST_AsGeoJSON(t.geometry, options => 1)::JSONB, 'properties', TO_JSONB(t.*) - 'geometry' ) AS feature FROM (SELECT f.incident_number_label, f.incident_name, f.fire_year, f.geometry FROM wfnews.published_incident_detail AS f WHERE stage_of_control_code != 'OUT' AND fire_of_note_ind = 'Y' AND geometry && ST_MakeEnvelope (#{xmin, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, #{ymin, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, #{xmax, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, #{ymax, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, )) t ) features
